caption: This photograph captures a person standing on a wet wooden pier or dock overlooking a rough sea. The person is looking towards the water where large waves are visible crashing against the shore or breakwaters, creating a misty spray. The individual is dressed in cold weather attire, featuring blue jeans, a heavy green coat with a fur-lined hood, and dark boots. The coat's hood is pulled up over their head to protect against the cold weather. The environment suggests a chilly or windy day, as evidenced by the clothing worn and the rough sea conditions. The sky above is partly cloudy, allowing some sunlight through but mostly providing a moody, overcast ambiance to the scene.
title: Gale-whipped waves break over the seawall at Michigan City
